description: This file defines the 'Quiz' component for a LightningJS application, which renders a quiz interface with questions, options, and navigation logic. It manages quiz state, renders UI elements with bindings to component state, and handles user interaction such as selection, navigation, and scoring.

methods.name: _labelFor
methods.description: Generates label for option index, e.g., 'A. option text'.

methods.name: _bgFor
methods.description: Determines background color for option based on selection and feedback state.

methods.name: _fgFor
methods.description: Determines foreground color for option text based on selection and feedback.

methods.name: evaluateSelection
methods.description: Checks if the selected answer is correct and updates feedback state.

methods.name: persistScore
methods.description: Stores quiz score increment in localStorage.

methods.name: resetScore
methods.description: Resets quiz score in localStorage to zero.

methods.name: navigateNext
methods.description: Handles moving to the next question or submitting results when quiz ends.
